events.description: Pests destroy the paddy rice crop completely. Insurance holders are protected.

events.description: Fungal infection ruins all dragon fruit plants. Insured farmers receive compensation.

events.name: Durian Harvest Fail
events.description: Extreme weather destroys the valuable durian harvest. Insurance covers the loss.

events.description: Perfect conditions and high demand! Shrimp profits soar by 50%.
